caption.p: EECP decreased the levels of HK2, PFK, PKM2, and LDHA in MDA-MB-231 cells stimulated with LPS. (a)–(d) EECP decreased the levels of HK2, PFK, PKM2, and LDHA in MDA-MB-231 cells, as detected by ELISA kits. (e)–(h) EECP decreased the levels of HK2, PFK, PKM2, and LDHA in MDA-MB-231 cells, as detected by RT-PCR. Values represent the mean ± SEM from three independent experiments ( ∗ P < 0.05, ∗∗ P < 0.01 vs. control, n = 3).
